Key Match Events: Jeffrey Vandersay picked up six wickets for just 33 runs
Rohit Sharma, Shubman Gill, Shivam Dube, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer and KL Rahul all fell victim to his accuracy
Post-Match Reflections: Jeffrey Vandersay credited his teammates for laying the foundation for his success
Vandersay admitted that dismissing the well-set Indian captain and opener, Rohit Sharma, boosted his confidence early on
Vandersay received the Player of the Match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: Vandersayâ€™s figures are the seventh-best for a Sri Lankan bowler in ODIs
Sri Lanka won the second ODI by 32 runs and leads the series 1-0
The series will continue with a third ODI on August 7 at the same venue
